Welcome

May 17, 2016

All of this started one night when I couldn’t sleep. I had just decided that I was going to quit my job and start something on my own. I had no idea what.. I do know that I like helping people, so I searched Google domains for ‘helpingothers.com’ – taken (obviously.) I am hysterical at 3:30am and I thought “Ok let’s make helpingotters.com work”

Feature images

November 29, 2014

This is an example of a post which includes a feature image specified in the front matter of the post. The feature image spans the full-width of the page, and is shown with the title on permalink pages.
